resources.string: Have you been in contact with someone infected with corona before
Do you have a high temperature of more than 38 degrees ?

Most common symptoms: fever cough tiredness loss of taste or smell Less common symptoms: sore throat headache aches and pains diarrhoea a rash on skin, or discolouration of fingers or toes red or irritated eyes Serious symptoms: difficulty breathing or shortness of breath loss of speech or mobility, or confusion chest pain Seek immediate medical attention if you have serious symptoms. Always call before visiting your doctor or health facility. People with mild symptoms who are otherwise healthy should manage their symptoms at home. On average it takes 5â€“6 days from when someone is infected with the virus for symptoms to show, however it can take up to 14 days.
